reviews.review_msg: Prof. Wang's lectures are a bit dry and abstract. It is hard to understand everything in the lecture, but the homework helps with understanding. Homework and midterm are reasonably challenging, and the final projects are graded very generously. The course is interesting and provides a very important foundation for advanced software engineering.

Unlike other professors at SFU, Professor Ternovska genuinely cares about her students and makes sure they fully understand the material.  The course was very difficult and at times a bit too fast paced (due to it being an intersession course) but she was always available for help via email and office hours.  Great prof!
